88.fullDescription: A reachable exception (opcode 0xfe) has been detected. This can be caused by type errors, division by zero, out-of-bounds array access, or assert violations. This is acceptable in most situations. Note however that `assert()` should only be used to check invariants. Use `require()` for regular input checking.

fullDescription.text:
A possible integer overflow exists in the function `AddMessage(address,uint256,string)`.
The addition or multiplication may result in a value higher than the maximum representable integer.

A reachable exception (opcode 0xfe) has been detected. This can be caused by type errors, division by zero, out-of-bounds array access, or assert violations. This is acceptable in most situations. Note however that `assert()` should only be used to check invariants. Use `require()` for regular input checking.

Reentrancy in ACCURAL_DEPOSIT.Collect (/data/demo_analysis/source_code/0x4320e6f8c05b27ab4707cd1f6d5ce6f3e4b3a5a1.sol#50-67):
